name: Catpocalypse Now
description:
You are in a room, with fragile furniture, a cat and a laser pointer. What could go wrong ?

Well nothing. Unless you use the laser pointer to make the cat crazy and have it completely wreck the living room of this flat.
Most of the object are destructible, but time is limited so be fast !

Use the mouse to control the laser and the cat will follow.  Stay a few second on an object and watch as the cat destroy it !
